EmailTemplate.description: Lender list school code of conduct webex second date
EmailTemplate.name: Lender List Webex 2
EmailTemplate.subject: You are invited to an ASA Update via webex!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join ASA!
HEA Reauthorization Webex: Preferred Lender Lists and School Codes of Conduct
Due to popular demand National FFELP guarantor American Student Assistance® has added a second HEA Reauthorization webex session. Join us for an in-depth discussion on implementing the changes drafted into the Higher Education Act Reauthorization Bill. Our regulatory analysts will focus on Preferred Lender Lists and School Codes of Conduct. This session will include an opportunity for question and answers.
Date and Time: March 4, 2009 at 2:30 p.m. EST – Preferred Lender Lists/School Code of Conduct
Who Should Attend: Any financial aid administrator interested in the most up to date information.
How to register or for additional information:
· Register Online at https://amsa.webex.com/amsa/onstage/g.php?d=328765580&t=a · Email: send your name, phone number and enrollment details to training@amsa.com · Phone: call the Training Department at (800) 999-9080, ext. 3099
All of ASA's training events are offered free of charge. Training is considered one of the guarantor's core responsibilities and ASA is dedicated to providing informative and useful training events for our industry colleagues.
Questions If you have any questions, please contact the Training Department, your client manager, regional account executive or ASA’s Call Center at (800) 999-9080 and select Option 1. The Call Center’s normal hours of operation are Monday through Friday from 8:30 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. ET.
For technical requirements for the WebEx online meeting: http://support.webex.com/support/system-requirements.html?_nfpb=true&_pageLabel=SystemRequirementsHome
